TopicTitle: Unable to click amy parts in the VAB

Articles.Content:
***KSP: 1.0.2 Windows 7 64bit***

***Problem: Unable to click*** ***any*** ***parts in the VAB***

**Mods installed:**

**Chatterer 0.9.5**

**Contract Configurator 1.2.0**

**Contract Pack: SCANsat 0.5.2**

**Distant Object Enhancement 1.5.5**

**Enhanced Navball 1.3.5**

**EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements 7.4**

**EVA Parachutes 1.2**

**EVA Parachutes by default 1.0**

**Infernal Robotics Model rework - Core v01b**

**Infernal Robotics Model rework - Expansion** **v01b**

**KErbal alarm clock 3.3.2.1**

**KAS 0.5.1**

**KIS 1.1.4**

**KSP AVC 1.1.5.0**

**Magic Smoke Industries Ifernal Robotics 0.21.2**

**Module Manager 2.6.5**

**Precise Node 1.1.3**

**Procedural Fairings 3.14**

**Rasterpropmonitor 0.19.4**

**Rasterpropmonitor core 0.19.4**

**SCANsat 12**

**ScienceAlert 1.8.7**

**Sentinal Memory Monitoring 0.3**

**SmokeScreen - Extended FX plugin 2.6.0**

**StageRecovery 1.5.6**

**Station Science 1.5**

**Toolbar 1.7.9**

**TweakScale 2.1**

**Vanguard Technologies Core 0.7.2**

**Waypoint Manager 2.3.2** 

***Reproduction steps:***

***Just need to enter the VAB and attempt to create a new ship, can't click on any parts on the list. Or load a pre-made ship, unable to remove any parts (right click does work). When it first occurred I reloaded the game and it let me move a few parts around then stopped again. Now when loading its not working at all. I've tried loading a couple of previous saves but its the same.***

***Not sure if its related but I have on occasion had an issue clicking other items when piloting. namely unable to click another ship to set a target or create a new maneuver. This only happened a few times and going back to the KSC and returning to the ship fixed it.***

**Log:**

[https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26687/output_log.txt](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/26687/output_log.txt)

**Thanks**

I have reinstalled the game and most of the mods and its still the same issue. I did leave out the station sci mod as I've noticed a few people mentioning that mod with this issue. However no solutions I can see.

Help ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Try to install mod after the mod and you might be able to find out which one is causing the problem
I know infernal robotics causes a lot of bugs, try removing that. Or, move all the mods to a seperate folder and run the game stock and see if the bug is still present. If it is, do the above post.

Thanks for the replies, I have removed all the mods and before starting to add them back on I tested it. It is still bugged but slightly differently, I can now click the parts on the left (all are in one big list and selecting the tabs doesn't change that) but they just appear in the VAB and are not movable, and still can't click on any parts on the ships I've already made.

Guess whatever mod caused this as broke the saves -.-
